sigpro

sigpro is a Jekyll git for ENGN2228 Signal Processsing course material

Usage

Switching Between Locally and Remotely Served

To switch between locally served and remotely served the configuration file _config.yml should be changed so that the baseurl parameter points to the home directory of the remote directory

Local

baseurl: ''
destination: ./_site

ANU CECS

Here we build the static site to a local folder and upload later.

baseurl: http://users.cecs.XXX.XXX.XX/~XXX/engn2228
destination: ./_site

for dropbox Public/engn2228

Here we build the static site to the local version of the Public folder.

baseurl: dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/XXXXXXX/engn2228
destination: /Users/XXXXXXXXXXXXX/Dropbox/Public/engn2228
